title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; simple chat & generate calls plus async support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package for Ollama models; drop-in LLM and embeddings provider.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Android support.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async wrappers for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama featuring chats, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that proxies to Ollama; showcases streaming completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama written in Go; supports conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-codellama
summary: Official guide and helper scripts for running Code Llama models with Ollama for fill-in-the-middle coding tasks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & CUDA) with docker-compose examples for quick local deployment.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Streamlit demo that combines Ollama LLM with Chroma vector store for private RAG chats over PDFs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Simple Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models; slash-command driven.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for the Ollama API with 50k+ weekly downloads.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Python; install with pip and chat with local models in two lines of code.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated library of 100+ community-contributed Modelfiles for Llama, Mistral, Phi, Gemma, Solar, etc.

title: ollama-rfcs
summary: Public RFC repository where the Ollama team discusses upcoming features like multi-modal, tool use, and clustering.
